question: Which country has assumed the chairship of BRICS for the year 2021?
explanation:
For the year 2021, the chairmanship of BRICS is vested with India.
India has commenced its chairship with the inauguration of 3-day-long Sherpas' meeting. The meeting was chaired by Secretary (CPV & OIA) of Ministry of External Affairs. During the meet, India introduced to the member countries its themes and priorities for the year 2021.
